channel.title: Items delete when logged off?
channel.description: I've made it so new players spawn with firecape in there inventory but if they wield it and later log off it's gone, even if they un-wield it and keep in inventory. Can you please help?

item.title: Items delete when logged off?
item.dc:creator: @sqeker sqeker
item.description:
@sqeker wrote:

I’ve made it so new players spawn with firecape in there inventory but if they wield it and later log off it’s gone, even if they un-wield it and keep in inventory. Can you please help?
